00020         [self load];

00031 - (void)load {
00032         if (!isGhost) return;
00033         
00034         // Grab all of the data for this particular section.
00035         NSString *query = [[NSString alloc] initWithFormat:@"SELECT * FROM Sections WHERE id=%@", identifier];
00036         
00037         sqlite3_stmt *statement;
00038         
00039         if (sqlite3_prepare_v2([DatabaseHelper getDatabase], [query UTF8String], -1, &statement, NULL) != SQLITE_OK) {
00040                 NSAssert(0, @"Query did not successfully complete.");
00041         }
00042         
00043         if (sqlite3_step(statement) == SQLITE_ROW) {
00044                 key = [NSString stringWithUTF8String:(char *)sqlite3_column_text(statement, 1)];
00045                 name = [NSString stringWithUTF8String:(char *)sqlite3_column_text(statement, 2)];
00046         }
00047         
00048         // Figure out which entries belong to this section.
00049         sqlite3_reset(statement);
00050         query = [[NSString alloc] initWithFormat:@"SELECT id FROM Entries WHERE section_id=%@", identifier];
00051         
00052         if (sqlite3_prepare_v2([DatabaseHelper getDatabase], [query UTF8String], -1, &statement, NULL) != SQLITE_OK) {
00053                 NSAssert(0, @"Query did not successfully complete.");
00054         }
00055         
00056         NSMutableArray *newEntries = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
00057         
00058         while (sqlite3_step(statement) == SQLITE_ROW) {
00059                 // Something's trying to release this NSNumber object.  Retain it so it doesn't disappear.
00060                 NSNumber *num = [[NSNumber numberWithInt:(int)sqlite3_column_int(statement, 0)] retain];
00061                 Entry *e = [[Entry alloc] initWithIdentifier:num];
00062                 [newEntries addObject:e];
00063         }
00064         
00065         entries = newEntries;
00066         
00067         [super load];
00068 }
00069 
00070 @end
